pca_test.cpp

00001 //===========================================================================
00050 //===========================================================================
00051 
00052 #include <fstream>
00053 #include "Rng/GlobalRng.h"
00054 #include "Array/ArrayIo.h"
00055 #include "Array/ArrayOp.h"
00056 #include "LinAlg/PCA.h"
00057 
00058 using namespace std;
00059 
00060 int main()
00061 {
00062     unsigned i;                     // Counter variable.
00063     Array< double > data( 100, 2 ); // Original data.
00064     Array< double > dataTrans;      // Transformed data.
00065     Array< double > dataReTrans;    // Retransformed data.    
00066     PCA             pcaV;           // The PCA instance.
00067     ofstream        pre,            // Storage file for original data.
00068                     white,          // Storage file for whitened data.
00069                     white_rt,       // Storage file for data in "white"
00070                                     // after retransformation.
00071                     pca,            // Storage file for data on which
00072                                     // only a PCA is performed.
00073                     pca_rt,         // Storage file for data in "pca"
00074                                     // after retransformation.
00075                     red;            // Storage file for data
00076                                     // on which a PCA and dimension reduction 
00077                                     // is performed.
00078 
00079 
00080     // Create random data...
00081     for ( i = 0; i < data.dim( 0 ); i++ ) 
00082     {
00083         double x = Rng::gauss( 2, 2 );
00084         double y = Rng::gauss( -1, 4 );
00085         data( i, 0 ) = 2 * x + y;
00086         data( i, 1 ) = x + 2 * y - .3;
00087     }
00088     // ...and save it.
00089     pre.open( "pre.dat" );
00090     if ( pre ) writeArray( data, pre );
00091     pre.close( );
00092 
00093     // Perform only PCA and save result:
00094     pcaV.reset( );
00095     pcaV.setRemoveMean( true );
00096     pcaV.setWhitening( false );
00097     pcaV.train( data );
00098     pcaV.transform( data, dataTrans );
00099     pca.open( "pca.dat" );
00100     if ( pca ) writeArray( dataTrans, pca );
00101     pca.close( );
00102     // Output of used transformation matrix:
00103     cout << "Transformation matrix used for PCA:" << endl;
00104     writeArray( pcaV.transMat( ), cout );
00105 
00106     // Retransformation of PCA-data, save result:
00107     pcaV.rtransform( dataTrans, dataReTrans );
00108     pca_rt.open( "pca_rt.dat" );
00109     if ( pca_rt ) writeArray( dataReTrans, pca_rt );
00110     pca_rt.close( );
00111 
00112     // Perform PCA with whitening and save result:
00113     pcaV.setRemoveMean( true );
00114     pcaV.setWhitening( true );
00115     pcaV.train( data );
00116     pcaV.transform( data, dataTrans );
00117     white.open( "white.dat" );
00118     if ( white ) writeArray( dataTrans, white );
00119     white.close( );
00120     // Output of used transformation matrix:
00121     cout << "Transformation matrix used for PCA with whitening:" << endl;
00122     writeArray( pcaV.transMat( ), cout );
00123 
00124     // Retransformation of whitened PCA-data, save result:
00125     pcaV.rtransform( dataTrans, dataReTrans );
00126     white_rt.open( "white_rt.dat" );
00127     if ( white_rt ) writeArray( dataReTrans, white_rt );
00128     white_rt.close( );
00129 
00130     // Perform PCA, reduce dimension and save result:
00131     pcaV.reset( );
00132     pcaV.setRemoveMean(true);
00133     pcaV.train( data );
00134     dataTrans.resize(1, data.dim( 1 ));
00135     pcaV.transform(data, dataTrans, 1);
00136     red.open( "red.dat" );
00137     if ( red ) {
00138         for ( i = 0; i < dataTrans.dim( 0 ); i++ ) 
00139         {
00140             // For a better visualization the y-value
00141             // '0' is added to the reduced data:
00142             red << dataTrans(i, 0) << " " << 0 << endl;
00143         }
00144     }
00145     red.close( );
00146     // Output of used transformation matrix:
00147     cout << "Transformation matrix used for PCA with dimension reduction:" 
00148          << endl;
00149     writeArray( pcaV.transMat( ), cout );
00150 
00151 
00152     return 0;
00153 }
